amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 637 related to prohibiting funds being used to take any action on the basis of an individual being a mortgage originator as definded in the Truth in Lending Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 15 printed in House Report 114-639 to strike section 637.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 255 (Roll no. 367).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 255 (Roll no. 367).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Ellison.
